components.label: 1. Does the Licensed Corporation have any internal audit function? [BQ17019]
components.tooltip: A function, whether provided by internal staff or third party, responsible for reviewing the adherence to, and the adequacy and effectiveness of, the Licensed Corporation's internal control.

components.label: 2. Please indicate the unit(s) which is/ are responsible for carrying out the internal audit functions for the Licensed Corporation.
components.description: Please choose all options that are applicable to the Licensed Corporation. [BQ17020]

values.label: (a) Internal Audit department of the Licensed Corporation
(b) Other  department(s) of the Licensed Corporation
(c) Internal Audit department of a group or affiliated company

components.label: 2(a). Please specify the number of staff in the department: [BQ17020_01_01]
2(b)(i). Please specify the name of the department: [BQ17020_02_01]
2(b)(ii). Please specify the number of staff in the department who is responsible for performing the internal audit function: [BQ17020_02_02]
2(c)(i). Please specify the name of the group or affiliated company: [BQ17020_03_01]
2(d)(i). Please specify the name(s) of the third party(ies): [BQ17020_04_01]
3. Please indicate the frequency that internal audit is carried out.
components.description: Please choose all options that are applicable to the Licensed Corporation. [BQ17021_01]

values.label: At least biennially (ie, at least once every two years)

components.label: 1(b). Reconcile house account balances regularly and at least monthly with [BQ17023_02]
I agree to the follow the rules
